review: The installation was quick & easy. Love the remote. Wish I would have purchased this for my other tv instead of the Google Chromecast.
author: Penny Jones

review: Bought Fire Stick after having the Roku 3 and I prefer the Fire Stick. There are not as maNY commercials,when watching music videos.  A little harder to navigate through than Roku, but you get used to it. I would recommend it. I have 2 Firestick and plan on getting 2 more.
author: Maserate

review: Not working with YouTube live channels
author: Eaglecopiersolutions

review: Easy to install seems to work as advertised!
author: Blue1401

review: Love this device!  Everything is at your fingertips!  Exceeded my expectations!
author: Dana M Craft

review: Only had it long enough to find out that it did not support he NHL or MLB app. Probably should have done more research on my end. Returned it for a Roku streaming stick which seemed to have more options. Worked fine for the few hours I owned it!
author: Michael Schroth
